body_html:
What is the value of BUILD_OPTS?

I never have to run Bazel with --cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc. Commands like bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/examples/label_image:label_image simply works.

Can you try to build from master branch?
body_text:
What is the value of BUILD_OPTS?
I never have to run Bazel with --cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc. Commands like bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/examples/label_image:label_image simply works.
Can you try to build from master branch?
body:
What is the value of `BUILD_OPTS`?

I never have to run Bazel with `--cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc`. Commands like `bazel build --config=opt //tensorflow/examples/label_image:label_image` simply works.

Can you try to build from master branch?
